name: Archris
description:
Game for the Go Godot Jam 3 (2022)

Year 2098, the evolution of AI and technology has reached it's peak and took over the control of the planet, slowly consuming all its energy. 

Whats left from Humanity now lives under the earth, enslaved by maschines, forced to mine minerals.

Only you can interrupt this circle of tech oppression!

Controls:

[MOUSE/KEYBOARD]

Move: WASD

Jump: SPACE

Aim / Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Warp: Right Mouse Button

[GAMEPAD]

Move: Right Thumbstick or DPAD

Jump: A

Aim / Shoot: R2 + Left Thumbstick

Warp: L2

Art and Code: 

Tino

Music: 

Rose Tinted Dreams

SFX:

Dark Fantansy Studio

12 Player Movement SFX by leohpaz

GFX:

Sky Background by Paulina Riva
